title: The black watch.
author: Picken, Andrew
snippet: " It's a braw day and a hopeful time, after all," said others, " when the Earl o' Breadalbane himsel patronizes the play o' the broadsword — by which we have won so many battles, and our forbears so much renown — by a fair trial of skill and manhood beneath the venerable walls o' the auld castle o' Bealach, whare the great knight o"" Lochaw once held his court.
